pr_title: Don't show share search button when in a selection session.

timeline.message:
Don't show share search button when in a selection session.

There were numerous issues integrating this inside selection session iframes. Plus, it doesn't really make sense for someone to want to share a search in a selections ession. So the decision was made (for now at least) to not show the share button in selection sessions

timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.message: use logical and operator, as it follows our in-house style better
